module.name: vCircleDisparity
module.description: Calculates the pixel disparity in stereo circle detections
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Calculates the pixel disparity in stereo circle detections.

param.desc: Specifies the stem name of ports created by the module.

input.description: Accepts the address events and/or flow events in the vBottle container

output.description: Outputs the cirlce detections in the form of an eventdriven::ClusterEventGauss. The vBottle also contains all events in the vBottle received as input.
Outputs debug information for use with yarpscope. The gap between input bottle numbers is written to detect data being lost.
Outputs a debugging images displaying events in the event-queue as well as the strength of the Hough transform from the same events.
Outputs a dump of detections for experiment analysis. The format is "Time Offset | Event Timestamp | X | Y | R | Score".
